startVerification.message.description:
To gain access to **{{name}}** you need to prove that you are a human by completing an anti-bot challenge.

If you do not see two buttons below, please update your Discord app or open it on the computer or the web browser.
startVerification.message.title: Verification required
verification.awkwardError: Well this is awkward, please try again! If the issues persists please directly contact a staff member!
verification.missingConfig:
We're sorry, but unfortunately some required configurations are still missing in this server.
Please contact a staff member directly through DM (Direct Messages), or send the team an email if they have one available on their website.
verification.missingPermission: Could not assign you the role due to the lack of permissions, please directly contact a staff member.
verification.pending: You already have a verification pending!
verificationFailed.description: Your verification failed, this message will refresh in 5 seconds so you can try again!
verificationFailed.title: Verification Failed!
verificationRequest.description: Please select the **{{choice}}** on the menu below!
verificationRequest.footer: Please be aware that there are more options than the ones visible! Make sure you scroll down ‚è¨ if you don't see the match.
verificationRequest.title: Verify yourself to gain access to the server
verificationSuccessfull.description.noti: you can access the server now
verificationSuccessfull.description.time: it might take a while to get your role due to the big flow of users requesting verification in this server right now, please be patient
verificationSuccessfull.title: Verified Successfully!
whyVerification.description:
This server is protected by <@{{mention}}> to prevent raids, bot accounts and malicious users.
For +information about the bot: [Sledgehammer Docs](https://docs.sledgehammer.app)

To gain access to **{{name}}** you need to prove that you are a human by completing an anti-bot challenge.

_This bot was developed by the [**Momentum Free**](https://momentum-free.com) team._
**Official links:** [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MomentumFree_); [Discord Services](https://discord.momentum-free.com); [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/Momentum-Free/)
whyVerification.title: Why an anti-bot challenge?
